lines_and_colors: I felt a Cleaving in my Mind -
As if my Brain had split -
I tried to match it - Seam by Seam -
But could not make them fit -
The thought behind, I strove to join
But Sequence ravelled out of Sound -
document.title: I felt a cleaving in my mind
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
